dmca.title: Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry complains of copying
dmca.body:
1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the following pages:

http://www.bernardine.corn/gemstones/amazonite.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/amber.htm http://www.bernardine.com/gemstones/amethyst.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/a.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/b.htm http://www.bernardine.com/birthstone/opal.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/c.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/d.htm http://www.bernardine.cornlgetnstones/dinobone.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/f.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/g.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/h.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/k.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/I.htm http://ww.bernardine.com/glossary/m.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/o.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/p.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/r.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/s.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/u.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/v.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/w.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossary/x.htm http://www.bernardine.com/glossaryly.htm

2. Search Query: "Amazonite is a gem variety of microcline
Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.jewelercentral.com/glossary.htm
http://jewelry.clicka2z.com/learning-center/gemstones/amazonite/amazonite-gemstone-jewelry.htm http://www.jewelry-retailer.com/glossary.htm
http://www.jewelrylocal.com/glossary/a.htm http://www.jewelrylinkexchange.com/glossary.htm http://www.jewelrylinkexchange.com/glossary/a.htm http://www.jewelryadvertise.com/glossary.htm http://www.jewelryadvertise.com/glossary/a.htm http://www.search4jewelry.com/glossary.htm http://jewelry-retailer.com/glossary.htm 
http://www.jewelrylocal.com/glossary.htm http://searchjeweler.com/glossary.htm 
http://www.jewelercentral.com/glossary/a.htm http://www.jewelrymagazine.com/glossary/a.htm http://www.colgandesigns.com/AmazoniteInformation.html http://www.findjeweler.com/jewelry_terms.htm http://www.jewelercentral.com/glossary.htm http://www.jewelrymagazine.com/glossary.htm
 
3.	Contact: [private]@bernardine.com.
4.	Contact information for infringing webpages: Most of these sites do not list an email address on the site and most appear to be registered at godaddy.com where the whois gives no email contact.

jewelrylocal.com - [private]@yahoo.com colgandesigns.com - [private] [private]@yahoo.com findjeweler.com - [private]@gmail.com

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


[private]
Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry http://www.bernardine.com
